## Changes in v1.4.4

### Cleanup

- **Onboarding** – Removed unused features onboarding screen; only the screen-recording permission step is shown.
- **Build** – Dropped `onboarding-features.html` from the packaged app.

### From v1.4.3

- Update check and release workflow fixes.
- OpenRouter Models window and “More models” improvements.

---

Note: This DMG is signed for smooth installation. Users on v1.4.1 or earlier will receive an automatic update prompt.

**If in-app update gets stuck at "Installing...":** Quit Jarvis, then download the **Jarvis-6.0-1.4.4-SIGNED.dmg** from the Assets below and open it to install. Your settings and data are preserved. After you're on 1.4.4, future in-app updates will complete normally.
